answers.answer: You might want to check with your doctor and be tested for gestational diabetes to be on the safe side. Don't mean to scare you but it can be dangerous if left untreated!! Congrats on the easy pregnancy though! :-)
lol Sounds like me! But I'm having a little girl and I'm 24 weeks and 4 days. :) Good luck to you!!
You could be worse. I'm 30weeks tmrw and gave already gained 45lbs :(

Congrats on the easy pregnancy hun....I wish weight gain was my only prob right now, I've gained 18lbs and im 19+6. But I think that's because I've been on bed rest for so long. I will be on a serious workout plan when my princess makes it here....good luck to you hun.
i am 26 weeks and only gained 16. my doctor told me i am 2 lbs heavier than i should be

question: Weight gain! I am 26 weeks and 2 days and i have gained over 25 lbs.Other than that and feeling my little man kick and punch....i wouldn't know i was pregnant.Please pray that i get this weight off after i deliver!
title: One and Only Pregnancy Symptom....
